title: Mean sea level pressure and 200 hPa wind
name: medium-mslp-wind200

title: Rain and mean sea level pressure
name: medium-mslp-rain
short_description: Precipitation totals include all precipitation types (rain, snow etc.) (in mm of rainfall or rainfall equivalent) falling in 6 hour or 12 hour periods using colour shading...
subtitle: Control forecast

title: Total cloud cover
name: medium-clouds
short_description: This display helps with the recognition of clouds of different layers, even when they overlap. Brighter colouring represents greater cloud cover.  Cloud-free areas appear white while areas of full cloud cover at all levels appear dark grey (e.g. active fronts)...
subtitle: Control forecast

title: Vorticity and 700 hPa wind
name: medium-rv-div-uv
short_description: The movement or transfer of vorticity helps in the assessment of vertical motion of air (ascent) in the troposphere.  Where a local vorticity maximum approaches an area there is a tendency for air to rise and where a local vorticity maximum moves ...
subtitle: Control forecast

title: (New!) Simulated images - visible channels
name: medium-simulated-vis
short_description: Simulated visible images show simulations of the upward flux of radiation (as would be detected by a weather satellite) derived from information using the model representation of temperatures and cloud layers.
subtitle: Control forecast

title: Simulated images - infrared
name: medium-simulated-ir
short_description: These products display cloud-related fields from the model in a format that is very familiar to forecasters and that they are used to interpreting.  They can easily be compared to actual satellite imagery...
subtitle: Control forecast

title: Simulated images - water vapour
name: medium-simulated-wv
short_description: The simulated water vapour images generally focus on the upper troposphere.  These charts can often indicate dynamical forcing mechanisms (responsible for cyclogenesis) or convective development (related to potential instability)...
subtitle: Control forecast

title: Simulated images (infrared) and 850 hPa wet bulb potential temperature
name: medium-simulated-wbpt

subtitle: Control forecast

title: Temperature and geopotential at various pressure levels

short_description: This display helps with the recognition of clouds of different layers, even when they overlap. Brighter colouring represents greater cloud cover.  Cloud-free areas appear white while areas of full cloud cover at all levels appear dark grey (e.g. active fronts)...
subtitle: AIFS

title: AIFS Single: Temperature and geopotential at various pressure levels
name: aifs_single_medium-t-z
short_description: In the northern hemisphere the air rotates anti-clockwise around low contour centres and clockwise around the high contour centres. In the southern hemisphere the air rotates clockwise around low contour centres and ...
subtitle: AIFS

title: AIFS Single: 2 m temperature and 10 m wind
name: aifs_single_medium-2t-wind
short_description: Temperatures at 2 m above the earth’s surface and winds at 10 m above the earth’s surface approximate most closely to the  conditions that a person would experience.
subtitle: AIFS

title: AIFS Single: Wind and geopotential heights at various pressure levels
name: aifs_single_medium-uv-z
short_description: The air flow is not the same at all levels and can be very different in strength and direction when associated with vigorous weather systems...
subtitle: AIFS

title: AIFS Single: Total column water
name: aifs_single_medium-tcw
short_description: The charts show the forecast value of the vertically integrated total column water (vapour + cloud water + cloud ice but with no precipitation included) in units of kg m⁻²...
subtitle: AIFS

title: AIFS Single: Total accumulated precipitation
name: aifs_single_medium-rain-acc
short_description: Total accumulated rainfall charts identify areas at greater risk of significant rainfall (or rain equivalent e.g.snowfall) but give no information regarding whether this occurs over a short or prolonged time period...
subtitle: AIFS

title: AIFS Single: Total snowfall during last 6 hours
name: aifs_single_medium-snowfall
short_description: Forecast precipitation is considered to be snow if the model atmosphere above and at the ground surface is forecast to be below 0°C.  Where  the ground surface lies near the 0°C level...
subtitle: AIFS

title: AIFS Single: Convective precipitation during last 6 hours
name: aifs_single_medium-rain-detailed
short_description: The charts show convective precipitation during the 6 hour period previous to the selected validity time...
subtitle: AIFS

title: AIFS Single: 2 m dewpoint temperature
name: aifs_single_medium-2t-dp
short_description: Dew Point Temperature at 2 m above the earth’s surface gives an indication of conditions which a person will experience or feel. High dewpoint temperatures inhibit heat loss from the body by perspriation and...
subtitle: AIFS

title: Experimental: AIFS (ECMWF) ENS Meteograms
name: aifs_opencharts_meteogram
short_description: AIFS Meteograms show a probabilistic interpretation of the ENS forecasts for specific locations using a box and whisker plot.  It shows the time evolution of the distribution of several meteorological parameters on a single diagram...
subtitle: AIFS Ensemble forecast
